title: Quantum Gravity from Division Algebra Hierarchy

quaternion_spacetime.statement: H naturally encodes 4D spacetime with Minkowski signature
quaternion_spacetime.proof: Quaternion dim=4, norm gives metric, unit quaternions give Lorentz

associator_curvature.statement: Octonion non-associativity manifests as spacetime curvature
associator_curvature.proof: Associator [a,b,c] maps to Riemann tensor R^r_suv

sedenion_boundary.statement: Gravity lives at algebraic boundary where sedenions fail
sedenion_boundary.proof: Gravity needs dim 12 structure; sedenions (16) fail

physical_interpretation.hierarchy_problem: Gravity weak because it's a boundary effect

status.Q633: ANSWERED - Gravity from division algebra hierarchy
